definition: slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: man4 xing4 pi2 lao2 zheng4 hou4 qun2

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly

pinyin: man4 xing4 zu3 se4 xing4 fei4 bing4

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通過脊神經療法或者瑜伽均可獲得顯著療效。

sentences.english: Chronics as the process is, the kidney failure may occur rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 雖然這一過程是慢性的，但腎衰竭也可能迅速出現。

sentences.english: Conclusion GKC is effective in treating chronic bronchitis in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 結論固本咳喘膠囊治療老年慢性支氣管炎療效確切。

sentences.english: The researchers found that higher scores on a measure of chronic loneliness were associated with an increase in warmer baths or showers.
sentences.chinese: 研究者發現較高分的慢性寂寞和溫度較高的洗浴有關。

sentences.english: Methods 108 gynecological patients with chronic cervicitis were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 選擇108例患有慢性宮頸炎的婦科病患者。

sentences.english: This paper introduces professor Zhou Duan s clinical experience in treating chronic cardiac insufficiency.
sentences.chinese: 介紹周端教授治療慢性心功能不全的臨證經驗。

sentences.english: Seen here in a portal tract is an intense chronic inflammatory infiltrate with loss of bile ductules.
sentences.chinese: 圖中的門管區具有突出的慢性炎性浸潤而膽小管喪失。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical significance of adenosine deaminase in chronic hepatitis B patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腺苷脫氨酶在慢性乙型肝炎中的應用價值。

sentences.english: Chronic pain is an invisible and agonizing symptom.
sentences.chinese: 慢性疼痛是一種無形的痛苦症狀。

sentences.english: It is clinically divided into the stage of attack and chronic remission stage.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀上可分爲發作期和慢性緩解期。

sentences.english: The chronic tractive injury at the elbow is the main factor of cubital tunnel syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 慢性肘部牽拉傷是導致肘管綜合徵的主要因素。

sentences.english: But no inflammation changes oc- cured in the chronic groups.
sentences.chinese: 但慢性組無慢性炎症改變。

sentences.english: But no inflammation changes oc- cured in the chronic groups.
sentences.chinese: 但慢性組無慢性炎症改變。

sentences.english: Chronic pain stimulus of lumbar and perineum regions would cause sexual disorder.
sentences.chinese: 腰部及會陰區的慢性疼痛刺激可導致性功能障礙。

sentences.english: Chronic phase appearance of radiation hepatitis is similar to that of hepatocirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 慢性期放射性肝損傷類似肝硬化之表現。

sentences.english: Duloxetine is also effective in the treatment of comorbid chronic pain in de- pression.
sentences.chinese: 對於抑鬱症伴發慢性疼痛也有一定的療效。

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
